high_descs: Turn left and walk to the couch, then turn right and head across the room to the door then turn right again to face the side of the tv stand
Pick up the remote that is sitting on the tv stand
Turn to the right and walk to the couch on the right
Place the remote on the right couch cushion
anns.task_desc: Place a remote on a couch

high_descs: Walk left around the coffee table to the left side of the TV stand.
Pick up the TV remote on the stand.
Turn right and walk to the couch and face it.
Place the remote on the right cushion of the couch.
anns.task_desc: Place a remote on a couch.

high_descs: turn left, take two steps, turn right between the couch and the coffee table, walk forward, turn right to face the side of the TV
pick up the remote that is next to the TV
turn right, walk towards coffee table, turn right, turn left between coffee table and couch, turn right to face couch
put the remote on the couch
anns.task_desc: move remote from TV stand to couch
